author: Katie Canales
title: Here are the do's and don'ts for going outside under the different lockdown or shelter-in-place restrictions as countries across the world battle the coronavirus
description: As the coronavirus disease continues to spread, governments across the globe are enforcing crackdowns to slow the spread of the virus. "Lockdown," "shelter-in-place," and "stay-at-home" are sometimes used interchangeably, but restrictions vary by the nation, …
content:
Countries, states, and cities across the world are enforcing lockdowns, shelter-in-place orders, and other restrictions in an attempt to curb the spread of the coronavirus disease, known as COVID-19.
The orders can differ in strictness. Residents on lockdown… [+1019 chars]
